name: review-ai-reply-functions
description: Firebase Cloud Functions for automated AI review workflow

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf src/shared && mkdir -p src/shared && cp -r ../lib/ai ../lib/google ../lib/types ../lib/repositories ../lib/stripe src/shared/ && rm -f src/shared/stripe/client.ts && find src/shared/ai -name '*.ts' -exec sed -i.bak -e 's|@/lib/types|../../types|g' -e 's|@/lib/ai/prompts/template|../ai/prompts/template|g' {} \; && find src/shared/google -name '*.ts' -exec sed -i.bak 's|@/lib/types|../types|g' {} \; && find src/shared/types -name '*.ts' -exec sed -i.bak -e 's|@/lib/ai/prompts/template|../ai/prompts/template|g' -e 's|firebase/firestore|firebase-admin/firestore|g' {} \; && find src/shared/repositories -name '*.ts' -exec sed -i.bak -e 's|import { adminDb } from "@/lib/firebase/admin";|import * as admin from "firebase-admin";\nconst adminDb = admin.firestore();|g' -e 's|@/lib/types|../types|g' -e 's|@/lib/stripe/|../stripe/|g' -e '/import { firestorePaths }/d' -e 's|firestorePaths\.businesses(userId, accountId)|`users/$\{userId}/accounts/$\{accountId}/businesses`|g' -e 's|firestorePaths\.accounts(userId)|`users/$\{userId}/accounts`|g' -e 's|firestorePaths\.reviews(userId, accountId, businessId)|`users/$\{userId}/accounts/$\{accountId}/businesses/$\{businessId}/reviews`|g' -e '/import { AdminQueryBuilder }/d' -e 's|const q = AdminQueryBuilder\.buildBusinessQuery(collectionRef, filters);|const q = collectionRef;|g' -e 's|const q = AdminQueryBuilder\.buildReviewQuery(collectionRef, filters);|const q = collectionRef;|g' -e 's|const q = AdminQueryBuilder\.buildAccountQuery(collectionRef, filters);|const q = collectionRef;|g' -e '/^  private userId: string;$/d' -e '/^  private accountId: string;$/d' -e '/^  private businessId: string;$/d' -e '/^    this\.userId = userId;$/d' -e '/^    this\.accountId = accountId;$/d' -e '/^    this\.businessId = businessId;$/d' {} \; && find src/shared/stripe -name '*.ts' -exec sed -i.bak -e 's|@/lib/stripe/|./|g' {} \; && find src/shared -name '*.bak' -delete
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
